title: Schenck v US on free speech - context

content.question: The Schenck case emerged most directly from the context of which of the following?

choices.label: Critiques by radicals of United States foreign policy
African American migration from the rural South to the urban North
Challenges by women to their prescribed status in society
Nativist resistance to migration from abroad

content.answer: Critiques by radicals of United States foreign policy

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
